# VoiceFleet — Full Product Reference for LLMs

> AI voice receptionist for small businesses. Answers phone calls 24/7, takes messages, books appointments, and escalates urgent calls — at 80% less than hiring a human receptionist.

## Company Overview

VoiceFleet is an AI-powered virtual receptionist SaaS product designed for small and medium businesses that depend on phone calls. It replaces or augments a human receptionist by answering every incoming call with a natural, human-like AI voice agent. The system understands caller intent through natural language processing, then takes the appropriate action automatically.

- **Website**: https://voicefleet.ai
- **Founded**: 2025
- **Headquarters**: Ireland
- **Active markets**: Ireland (English) and Argentina (Spanish)
- **Contact**: support@voicefleet.ai
- **Demo booking**: https://calendly.com/voicefleet

---

## How It Works

1. **Forward your number**: After signup, you get a VoiceFleet phone number. Enable call forwarding from your existing business number to VoiceFleet.
2. **AI answers calls**: The AI receptionist picks up quickly, greets the caller with your custom greeting, and has a natural conversation.
3. **Takes action**: Depending on the call, the AI will book an appointment, take a detailed message, answer common questions, or flag urgent matters.
4. **You stay informed**: Instant notifications via SMS or email with call summaries, caller details, and any actions taken.

Setup takes under 1 hour. No technical skills required. VoiceFleet handles the configuration.

---

## Pricing

### Ireland / Europe (EUR)

| Plan | Monthly | Annual | Minutes | Est. Calls | Parallel Calls | Overage |
|------|---------|--------|---------|------------|----------------|---------|
| Starter | €99/mo | €999/yr | 500 | ~200 | 1 | €0.20/min |
| Growth | €299/mo | €2,999/yr | 1,000 | ~400 | 3 | €0.30/min |
| Pro | €599/mo | €5,999/yr | 2,000 | ~800 | 5 | €0.30/min |

### Argentina (USD)

| Plan | Monthly | Annual | Minutes | Est. Calls | Overage |
|------|---------|--------|---------|------------|---------|
| Starter | $49/mo | $499/yr | 250 | ~100 | $0.20/min |
| Growth | $149/mo | $1,499/yr | 500 | ~200 | $0.30/min |
| Pro | $299/mo | $2,999/yr | 1,000 | ~400 | $0.30/min |

- Annual plans save 16%
- 5-day free trial on all plans, no credit card required
- No per-call fees, no contracts, no setup charges
- Cancel anytime

### Cost Comparison

A human receptionist in Ireland costs approximately €56,000/year fully loaded. VoiceFleet Starter costs €1,188/year — over 95% cheaper with 24/7 coverage, no sick days, no holidays.

In Argentina, a human receptionist costs approximately USD 12,000/year. VoiceFleet Starter costs $588/year — over 85% cheaper.

---

## Features

### All Plans
- **AI Call Handling**: Natural conversations powered by advanced AI. Takes orders, books reservations, answers questions automatically.
- **24/7 Availability**: Never miss a call. Works around the clock including holidays and weekends.
- **Local Phone Numbers**: Irish or Argentine phone number included with every plan.
- **SMS & Email Notifications**: Instant alerts for every call with caller details and summaries.
- **Instant Setup**: Go live in under 1 hour. Free setup included, no IT required.
- **Order & Reservation Management**: AI handles orders, table reservations, and appointment booking.
- **Smart Call Routing**: AI knows when to handle calls and when to transfer to staff. Configurable escalation rules.
- **Emergency Flagging**: Urgent calls are flagged for immediate attention.
- **GDPR Compliant**: EU data residency (Ireland and Frankfurt data centres). Data encryption in transit and at rest.

### Growth & Pro Plans
- **Calendar Integration**: Real-time availability sync with Google Calendar, Outlook, Calendly, Cal.com, Square Appointments, SimplyBook.me, Mindbody, TheFork, OpenTable, Resy.
- **Custom Voice & Scripts**: Personalize the AI voice, greeting, tone, and conversation flow.
- **Transfer to Human**: Seamless handoff to staff when needed.
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Track call volumes, peak hours, popular queries, and trends.

### Pro Plan Only
- **Multi-Location Support**: Manage up to 5 locations from one dashboard with per-location phone numbers and analytics.
- **90-Day Call Recordings**: Extended recording retention.
- **Dedicated Support**: Dedicated account manager with 24/7 support.
- **Early Access**: First access to new features.

---

## Industries Served

VoiceFleet serves any small business that receives phone calls. Primary verticals:

- **Medical & Dental**: Patient scheduling, prescription refill requests, appointment reminders, after-hours triage
- **Legal & Accounting**: Client intake, appointment scheduling, document request handling
- **Restaurants & Hospitality**: Reservation booking, menu inquiries, order taking, event bookings
- **Trades & Services**: Plumbers, electricians, handymen — job booking, emergency call routing, quote requests
- **Property & Letting**: Viewing appointments, tenant inquiries, maintenance requests
- **Salons & Wellness**: Appointment booking, service inquiries, waitlist management
- **Gyms & Fitness**: Class bookings, membership inquiries, personal training scheduling
- **Retail**: Product availability, store hours, order status

---

## Technical Specifications

- **Response latency**: Sub-500ms average
- **Uptime SLA**: 99.9%
- **Infrastructure**: Multi-region (Ireland + Frankfurt)
- **Security**: SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, ISO 27001, PCI DSS
- **Voice technology**: Natural language processing with human-like voice synthesis
- **Languages**: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian
- **Integrations**: Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook/365, Calendly, Cal.com, Square Appointments, SimplyBook.me, Mindbody, TheFork, OpenTable, Resy

---

## Competitive Positioning

VoiceFleet vs alternatives:

| Feature | VoiceFleet | Smith.ai | Ruby | Traditional Receptionist |
|---------|-----------|----------|------|-------------------------|
| 24/7 coverage | Yes | Yes | Business hours only | Business hours only |
| Starting price | €99/mo | ~$240/mo | ~$230/mo | €30,000+/yr |
| Setup time | < 1 hour | Days | Days | Weeks |
| Languages | 5+ | English | English | Varies |
| Calendar integration | Yes | Limited | Limited | Manual |
| GDPR compliant | Yes | No (US-based) | No (US-based) | Depends |

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

**How do I forward my calls to VoiceFleet?**
After signup, you get a VoiceFleet number. Enable call forwarding from your existing number — most providers can be set up in minutes.

**Can it handle accents and names?**
Yes. VoiceFleet handles a wide range of accents, names, and pronunciations including Irish and Argentine Spanish.

**What happens if the caller needs a human?**
You control escalation rules. VoiceFleet can transfer to staff, take a detailed message, or flag urgent calls.

**Can it book appointments in my calendar?**
Yes. Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, Calendly, Cal.com and others. Checks availability, books appointments, sends confirmations.

**Is there a free trial?**
Yes. 5-day free trial on all plans. No credit card required.

**Can I cancel anytime?**
Yes. No contracts. Cancel anytime and service continues until end of billing period.
